item.title: CVE-2013-1910|2024-08-06T15:20:37.295Z -- yum -- yum
item.description: yum does not properly handle bad metadata, which allows an attacker to cause a denial of service and possibly have other unspecified impact via a Trojan horse file in the metadata of a remote repository.
